name: Cantrip
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Shocking Grasp” _(To repel a foe!)_
- “Magic Missile” _(To blast at range!)_
- “Expeditious Retreat” _(To dart a great distance!)_

name: Cheap Trick
text:
Cast the “Expeditious Retreat” spell in the spellbook.
_(To dart a great distance!)_

name: Prepare Spells
text:
Add all spell cards to the spellbook. Only Gydion can look at the cards in the spellbook.
As each spell is cast, remove it from the spellbook faceup. The action on the spell card is performed by the hero casting the spell.

name: Elementary Enchantment
text:
Cast the “Suggestion” spell in the spellbook.
_(Compel the opposing champion to take a few extra steps.)_

name: Elementary Evocation
text:
Cast the “Burning Hands” spell in the spellbook.
_(Burn multiple opponents in near vicinity.)_

name: Elementary Abjuration
text:
Cast the “Shield” spell in the spellbook.
_(The magic shield protects against mundane threats.)_

name: Lesser Evocation
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Burning Hands”
- “Fireball”
_(Wait for your allies to clear the area before hurling a fireball!)_

name: Lesser Necromancy
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Vampiric Touch”
- “Create Undead”
_(Harm your foe to heal yourself. Raise an undead servant.)_

name: Greater Evocation
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Burning Hands”
- “Fireball”
- “Sunburst”
_(Sunburst's reach and power grows with every cast spell.)_

name: Greater Necromancy
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Vampiric Touch”
- “Create Undead”
- “Energy Drain”
_(Drain energy from a foe in sight to restore your vitality.)_

name: Lesser Enchantment
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Suggestion”
- “Dominate Person”
_(Turn the dominated person against their own troops.)_

name: Lesser Transmutation
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Midas Touch”
- “Disintegrate”
_(Create gold. Turn objects and lesser creatures into dust.)_

name: Greater Enchantment
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Suggestion”
- “Dominate Person”
- “Power Word Kill”
_(Command a weakened foe within earshot to perish instantly.)_

name: Greater Transmutation
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Midas Touch”
- “Disintegrate”
- “Polymorph”
_(Polymorph enemies into creatures or objects and vice versa.)_

name: Lesser Abjuration
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Shield”
- “Banishment”
_(Touch anything to have it banished where you please.)_

name: Lesser Conjuration
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Find Familiar”
- “Dimension Door”
_(Summon a familiar to assist you. Travel to a faraway place.)_

name: Greater Abjuration
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Shield”
- “Banishment”
- “Invulnerability”
_(Invulnerability makes you impervious to deadly perils.)_

name: Greater Conjuration
text:
**Choose and cast one** spell in the spellbook —
- “Find Familiar”
- “Dimension Door”
- “Cloud Kill”
_(Create a deadly cloud within distance to weaken your foe.)_

name: The Archwizard
text: Whenever you would add cards to the spellbook, you may cast the “Wish” spell in the spellbook instead.
